**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 135 1.1 **Price** 13,000 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- A _zealot staff's_ color, iconography, and materials vary depending on the faith it's dedicated to. An [Iomedaean](/Deities.aspx?ID=9) staff might be forged of gold and shaped like an ornamental sword, while a [Lamashtan](/Deities.aspx?ID=11) one could instead be made of blackened iron depicting monstrous faces. Used as a weapon, the staff is a _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)_. The staff represents vehement support of the deity to whom the staff is dedicated, punishing defiance. When the staff's effects require choosing alignments, you can choose only that deity's alignments. No such staves exist for deities that are true neutral. When you prepare this staff, if you don't worship its deity, you become [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) until your next daily preparations.
  • **Cantrip** [_divine lance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=84)
  • **1st** [_bane_](/Spells.aspx?ID=18)
  • **2nd** [_brand the impenitent_](/Spells.aspx?ID=570), [_spiritual weapon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=306)
  • **3rd** [_crisis of faith_](/Spells.aspx?ID=55), [_warding aggression_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1029)
  • **4th** [_anathematic reprisal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=9), _spiritual weapon_
  • **5th** [_divine wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=86)
  • **6th** _spiritual weapon_, [_zealous conviction_](/Spells.aspx?ID=378)
  • **7th** [_divine decree_](/Spells.aspx?ID=82)
**Craft Requirements** You worship the deity to which the staff is dedicated. Supply one casting of all listed spells.
name: Zealot Staff
